title: Coming up - 4BR/2BTH nr Ditmars Blvd Pets ok, Aug/Sep move
posting_body: ['We do not have images yet since apartment is under renovation.', "We really don't have much information other than what's stated in this ad.", ' We are taking interest lists at the moment.', 'Either 8/15/22 or 9/1/22 move.', ' More images will be available after 8/1 and we can also start showing at that time', '4 Bedroom and 2 Bathrooms.', '8 min walk from NW Ditmars Blvd station.', ' Pets ok.', ' Heat/hot water/water included.', ' NO GUARANTORS!', "(You'd have to have household income of $152,000/yr or above).", ' One year lease with option to renew.', "Please reply with your phone number (required) and tell us something about yourself, whoever you'll be living with if applicable and your guarantr if applicable.", '  Broker fee applies']
